sentences.sentence: About 2% of the same year self-crossing crucian carp are hermaphroditism.
sentences.translation: 从方正银鲫自交繁殖的当年鱼群体中发现约有2％左右的雌雄同体。

sentences.sentence: ObjectiveTo summarize the experience of diagnosis and treatment of true hermaphroditism.
sentences.translation: 目的总结对真两性畸形的诊断和治疗经验。

sentences.sentence: Purpose: To summarize the diagnostic point and therapeutic experience of 13 cases of true hermaphroditism.
sentences.translation: 目的：总结13例真两性畸形的诊断要点及治疗体会。
